passages.text:
Stalker:Blyat....We're going to have to go through the educational district.  The electromagnetic climate [color=red]commands[/color] it.

Hopefully we'll make it through in one piece. 

But somehow, I'm not so sure.

Monologue:What makes him say that?

[[You sound hesitant]]
[[I was also hoping to avoid the school district]]

links.name: I was also hoping to avoid the school district
links.link: I was also hoping to avoid the school district

passages.name: Avoidance

passages.text:
I am hesitant.  Passing through that route means contending with the mule.  
[[Go back->Avoidance]]
passages.name: You sound hesitant
I was also hoping to avoid the school district
